plot: A reality-based medical drama, Healing Hands II like Healing Hands I continues to reveal the-life tensions in emergency rooms and the challenges - both personal and professional - faced by a group of hospital workers.
plot_en: A reality-based medical drama, Healing Hands II like Healing Hands I continues to reveal the-life tensions in emergency rooms and the challenges - both personal and professional - faced by a group of hospital workers.
plot_es: A reality-based medical drama, Healing Hands II like Healing Hands I continues to reveal the-life tensions in emergency rooms and the challenges - both personal and professional - faced by a group of hospital workers.
title: Miu sau yun sum yee
